con:condition.con:name: SamePassword
con:condition.con:expression: declare namespace ns1='https://excelsiorqa-api.eyekor.com/api/v1/Auth/ResetPassword/admin'; matches(//ns1:Response[1]/ns1:exception[1]/text(), 'Please use a different password')

con:configuration.content: Your account has been locked. If you forgot your password, please click on 'Forgot Password' to reset your password.
